text:
Luisa E. Navas (aka Eugenia Navas) (born 1918 in Chillán-pass away in Santiago on 18 November 2020) is a Chilean botanist and professor in Pharmacy School of the Chilean University.
Works.
Flora de la cuenca de Santiago de Chile. Tomo I. Pteridophyta, Gimnospermae, Monocotyledoneae. Ediciones de la Universidad de Chile, Santiago, Chile. 301 pp.
